description: One of the Wazamono grade swords and a cursed blade. It is the weakest of the Kitetsu swords but possesses a bloodthirsty nature that can act independently of its wielder.

ownershipHistory.circumstances: Obtained from Ipponmatsu's weapon shop in Loguetown after testing its curse

keyMoments.title: Cursed Nature Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Sandai Kitetsu blocks an attack on its own without Zoro commanding it, acting independently to protect its wielder.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of the sword's cursed properties and independent will in combat.

keyMoments.title: First Real Combat Test
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses Sandai Kitetsu in actual combat against Baroque Works agents for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: First battle use of the sword after acquiring it in Loguetown.

abilities.description: The cursed blade can move and react on its own to protect its wielder or attack enemies.
As a Wazamono grade sword, it possesses superior cutting ability.

curse.description: All Kitetsu blades are cursed and known to bring death to their wielders. The blade has a bloodthirsty will of its own.
curse.manifestation: Acts independently without the wielder's command

description: A Skillful Grade sword known for being remarkably light. Given to Zoro by Ipponmatsu in Loguetown as a gift alongside Sandai Kitetsu.

keyMoments.title: First Real Combat Test
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses Yubashiri in actual combat against Baroque Works agents for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: First battle use of the sword after acquiring it in Loguetown.

abilities.description: The sword is remarkably light, allowing for faster strikes and movements.
As a Skillful Grade sword, it possesses excellent cutting ability.
